concept.title: Enabling SSL
concept.shortdesc: You can configure the RPC destination to enable the secure transfer of data with SSL. To enable SSL, you need a truststore, or trusted keystore, that includes the public key of the SSL certificate of the RPC origin, and the associated password.Tucu - is this all correct?

In the RPC destination, enter the filename and password.
